text: niscayanga, allah ku sam'matamaina dharmam kevalam allah ku vidheyulavatam (islam) matrame. Kani purva grantha prajalu paraspara irsyato, variki jnanam labhincina taruvatane bhedabhiprayalaku lonayyaru. Mariyu evaraite allah sucanalanu tiraskaristaro! Varu niscayanga, allah lekka tisukovatanlo ati sighrudu (ani telusukovali)
